div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: code: Body mass index (BMI) (LOINC#LP35925-4; Datatable CodeSystem (lists all variables)#bmi)

note: This is an otherwise ordinary Observation except for a few extra bits of information. In addition to a meaningful public term for the code, we can also provide the code associated with the variable in which the data was found.

text.value: This is an otherwise ordinary Observation except for a few extra bits of information. In addition to a meaningful public term for the code, we can also provide the code associated with the variable in which the data was found.
